==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}

A {{liushu|p|nocap=y}} of a rake-like tool or weapon, borrowed for sound to mean "I" (note oracle bone script form); considered by some to be an ideograph of a hand {{zh-l|手}} holding a weapon {{zh-l|戈}} to protect oneself.

===Etymology===
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*ŋa}}. Cognate with {{zh-m|吾}}, {{zh-m|俺}}, {{zh-m|𠊎}}.

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|わ}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=わ}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> The short form of {{m|ja|我|tr=ware}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|わ|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|吾}}, {{ja-l|和}} {{qualifier|rare}}

====Pronoun====
{{ja-pos|pronoun|わ}}

# first-person personal pronoun: [[I]], [[me]]
#* {{RQ:Taketori Monogatari}}
#*: 「[...]'''わ'''が丈たち竝ぶまで養ひたてまつりたる我子を、なに人が迎へきこえん。まさに許さんや」と言ひて、[...]
#* {{RQ:Genji Monogatari|Kiritsubo}}
#*: かしこき御蔭をば、たのみきこえながら、貶めきずを求め給ふ人はおほく、'''わ'''がみはかよわく、物はかなきありさまにて、中々なる物思ひをぞし給ふ。
#* {{RQ:Genji Monogatari|Utsusemi}}
#*: 女どち、のどやかなる夕闇の、道たどたどしげなるまぎれに、'''わ'''が車にてゐてたてまつる。

=====Usage notes=====
In modern Japanese, most often encountered in fossilized phrases in combination with the {{etyl|ojp|-}} possessive particle {{ja-r|が}}, such as {{m|ja|我が儘|tr=wagamama|lit=just as I like||selfish; selfishness}} or {{m|ja|我が国|tr=wagakuni||my country, my homeland; {{qualifier|by extension}} Japan}}.

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|われ}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=われ}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> Appears to be {{suffix|lang=ja|sort=われ|我|tr1=wa|pos1=see above|れ|tr2=re}}, a nominalizing suffix also seen in terms such as {{m|ja|これ|tr=kore||this}} and {{m|ja|誰|tr=dare||who}}.

The long form of {{m|ja|我|tr=wa}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|われ|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|吾}}

====Pronoun====
{{ja-pos|pronoun|われ}}

# first person personal pronoun: [[I]], [[me]], [[oneself]]
#* {{RQ:Man'yōshū|14|3384}}
#*: 可都思加能 麻末能手兒奈乎 麻許登可聞 '''和礼'''尓余須等布 麻末乃弖胡奈乎
#* {{RQ:Taketori Monogatari}}
#*: この人々、あるときは竹取を呼び出て「娘を'''吾'''にたべ」と、ふし拝み、手をすりのたまへど[...]
#* {{RQ:Taketori Monogatari}}
#*: 「[...]わが丈たち竝ぶまで養ひたてまつりたる我子を、なに人が迎へきこえん。まさに許さんや」と言ひて、「'''われ'''こそ死なめ」とて[...]
#* {{RQ:Genji Monogatari|Utsusemi}}
#*: 紀の守のいもうとも、こなたにあるか。'''われ'''に、垣間見せさせよ
#* {{RQ:Nippo Jisho}}
#*: '''Vare'''. ワレ (我) 私. また, おまえ. 本来の正しい言い方ではないが、下賎な者と話したり, 人を軽しめたりする時に用いる.
# second person personal pronoun; [[you]]
#* {{RQ:Nippo Jisho|679}}
#*: '''Vare'''. ワレ (我) 私. また, おまえ. 本来の正しい言い方ではないが、下賎な者と話したり, 人を軽しめたりする時に用いる.

=====Usage notes=====
In modern Japanese, most often encountered in the plural forms {{m|ja|我等|tr=warera}} and {{m|ja|我我|tr=wareware||we, us}}.

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|わぬ}}
{{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=わぬ}}. Ancient eastern dialect. Cognate with {{m|ja|我|tr=ware}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

Obsolete.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|わぬ}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|吾}}

====Pronoun====
{{ja-pos|pronoun|わぬ}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=わぬ|obsolete}} first person personal pronoun: [[I]], [[me]], [[oneself]]
#* {{RQ:Man'yōshū|14|3476}}
#*: 宇倍兒奈波 '''和奴'''尓故布奈毛 多刀都久能 努賀奈敝由家婆 故布思可流奈母 或本歌末句曰 奴我奈敝由家杼 '''和奴'''賀由乃敝波
#* {{RQ:Man'yōshū|20|4358}}
#*: 於保伎美乃 美許等加志古美 伊弖久礼婆 '''和努'''等里都伎弖 伊比之古奈波毛

===Etymology 4===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|わろ}}
{{IPAchar|/waro<sub>2</sub>/}} → {{IPAchar|/waro/}}

{{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=わぬ}}. Ancient eastern dialect. Likely a compound of {{suffix|lang=ja|sort=わろ|我|tr1=wa|pos1=see above|ろ|tr2=ro|pos2={{etyl|ojp|-}} suffix indicating affection}}.

Obsolete.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|わろ}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|吾}}

====Pronoun====
{{ja-pos|pronoun|わろ}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=わろ|obsolete}} first person personal pronoun: [[I]], [[me]], [[oneself]]
#* {{RQ:Man'yōshū|20|4343}}
#*: '''和呂'''多比波 多比等於米保等 已比尓志弖 古米知夜須良牟 和加美可奈志母

===Etymology 5===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|あ}}
{{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=あ}}. The short form of {{m|ja|我|tr=are}}.

Obsolete. Fell into disuse in roughly the [[w:Heian period|Heian period]],<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref> when it was replaced by ''wa'' (see above).

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|あ}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|吾}}

====Pronoun====
{{ja-pos|pronoun|あ}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=あ|obsolete}} first-person personal pronoun: [[I]], [[me]]
#* {{RQ:Man'yōshū|14|3456}}
#*: 宇都世美能 夜蘇許登乃敝波 思気久等母 安良蘇比可祢弖 '''安'''乎許登奈須那
#* {{RQ:Man'yōshū|14|3457}}
#*: 宇知日佐須 美夜能和我世波 夜麻登女乃 比射麻久其登尓 '''安'''乎和須良須奈
#* {{RQ:Man'yōshū|14|3458}}
#*: 奈勢能古夜 等里乃乎加恥志 奈可太乎礼 '''安'''乎祢思奈久与 伊久豆君麻弖尓
#* {{RQ:Man'yōshū|14|3471}}
#*: 思麻良久波 祢都追母安良牟乎 伊米能未尓 母登奈見要都追 '''安'''乎祢思奈久流
#* {{RQ:Genji Monogatari|Yūgao}}
#*: '''あ'''が君、生き出で給へ。いと、いみじき目な見せ給ひそ

===Etymology 6===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|あれ}}
The long form of {{m|ja|我|tr=a}}. Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=あれ|我|tr1=a|pos1=see above|れ|tr2=re}}, a nominalizing suffix also seen in terms such as {{m|ja|これ|tr=kore||this}} and {{m|ja|誰|tr=dare||who}}.

Obsolete. Fell into disuse in roughly the [[w:Heian period|Heian period]],<ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref> when it was replaced by ''ware'' (see above).

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|あれ}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|吾}}

====Pronoun====
{{ja-pos|pronoun|あれ}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=あれ|obsolete}} first-person personal pronoun: [[I]], [[me]]
#* {{RQ:Man'yōshū|5|808}}
#*: 多都乃麻乎 '''阿礼'''波毛等米牟 阿遠尓与志 奈良乃美夜古迩 許牟比等乃多仁
#* {{RQ:Man'yōshū|14|3361}}
#*: 安思我良能 乎弖毛許乃母尓 佐須和奈乃 可奈流麻之豆美 許呂'''安礼'''比毛等久
#* {{RQ:Man'yōshū|15|3585}}
#*: 和伎母故我 之多尓毛伎余等 於久理多流 許呂母能比毛乎 '''安礼'''等可米也母
#* {{RQ:Man'yōshū|17|3932}}
#*: 須麻比等乃 海辺都祢佐良受 夜久之保能 可良吉恋乎母 '''安礼'''波須流香物
#* {{RQ:Man'yōshū|18|4058}}
#*: 多知婆奈能 登乎能多知婆奈 夜都代尓母 '''安礼'''波和須礼自 許乃多知婆奈乎
#* {{RQ:Man'yōshū|20|4298}}
#*: 霜上尓 安良礼多婆之里 伊夜麻之尓 '''安礼'''波麻為許牟 年緒奈我久 <sub>古今未詳</sub>
#* {{RQ:Genji Monogatari|Yume no Ukihashi}}
#*: [...]と、聞こえ動かして、几帳のもとに、おし寄せたてまつりたれば、'''あれ'''にもあらず、居給へるけはい[...]
